map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • map.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GuiConnect

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements GuiConnect
    Map class that implements the GuiConnect to communicate with the fx components. It is responsible to coordinate Player, Storage and Rooms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Map()
      Constructor Most variables get instantiated by a call to newGame from the GUI

      • getStats

        public java.lang.String[] getStats()
        Description copied from interface: GuiConnect
        Get player stats as array of String. The array has the following structure: 0: name of player 1: his current KP 2: his current level 3: name of the equipped weapon 4: collected amount of gold 5: number of gone steps
        Specified by:
        getStats in interface GuiConnect
        Returns:
        String array of fixed length with 6 entries.
